description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Rescue drowning victims from the beach, and stuff. 21 levels, half of them runner, the other half a mix of CPR, driving, swimming, and flying. Does anyone ever read these descriptions? I doubt it... If you're one of the 0.001% of people still reading, send me a tweet on twitter saying you read til the end and I'll send you a free download code (if I still have any).
